  • Anxious ‚Äî because saying no feels dangerous

Key insight:

This often develops in:

  • roles where you became ‚Äúthe responsible one‚Äù early

Why Saying No Feels So Hard

Saying no doesn‚Äôt feel like a choice. It feels like a threat.

19. Boundaries and Forgiveness
